Source.Name: libcddb
Source.Summary: A library for accessing a CDDB server
Source.Description: Libcddb is a library that implements the different protocols (CDDBP, HTTP, SMTP) to access data on a CDDB server (e.g http://freedb.org/).

Package.Name: libcddb
Package.Summary: A library for accessing a CDDB server
Package.Description: Libcddb is a library that implements the different protocols (CDDBP, HTTP, SMTP) to access data on a CDDB server (e.g http://freedb.org/).
